headline: How Trump’s Win Might Drive Foreign Defense Budgets, Benefiting Lockheed Martin (LMT)
summary: Slowing revenue growth and reduced margins may have spoiled the party for Lockheed Martin (LMT) shareholders, but the stock has outperformed the S&P 500 this year. Trump’s election victory has spurred hopes of increased spending on defense though, sending the stock higher. Lockheed Martin is a leader in the aerospace and defense sectors focusing on […]

headline: Palantir Overtakes Lockheed Martin In Market Cap, How Does The 'Messi Of AI' Stack Up Against The Traditional Defense Player
summary: Palantir Technologies Inc.‘s (NYSE:PLTR) market capitalization has exceeded that of traditional defense industry leader Lockheed Martin Corp. (NYSE:LMT), marking a significant shift in the defense and technology sector landscape. Don't Miss: Unlock ...

headline: Embraer to Supply C-390 Multi-Mission Military Aircraft to Sweden
summary: ERJ has been selected by the Swedish Ministry of Defense to supply its C-390 Millennium multi-purpose aircraft.

headline: X-59 Engine Roars, Lockheed Martin Starts Last Major Ground Test
summary: Lockheed Martin Skunk Works® (NYSE: LMT), in partnership with NASA Aeronautics, started X-59 engine run testing, marking the aircraft's final major system check-out before taxi tests and first flight. The tests also mark the first time the X-59 was powered fully internally.

headline: Lockheed Martin's Unit Secures Contract to Modify CH-53K Helicopters
summary: LMT's unit, Sikorsky Aircraft, secures a $20.6 million contract to modify CH-53K helicopters for the Israel Air Force.
